===Overview===
The '''Brazilian Navy''' is the naval service branch of the ''Brazilian Armed Forces''.

===Modern Age===
Since [[Brazil]] refused to become an ally of the recently founded [[krakoa|mutant nation]], the country's Government started to prohibit brazilian [[Homo superior|mutants]] to leave the country and join Krakoa. The Navy was used to enforce this politics.{{r|Marauders Vol 1 4}}
